'''''Use the Force, Sorush''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to use the [[Sorush (Gadget)|Sorush]] gadget to drop [[Nirodha Fruit]]s on 15 Amrita crystals.

==Location==
See the [https://act.hoyolab.com/ys/app/interactive-map/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=477 Teyvat Interactive Map] for Nirodha Fruit locations.

==Trivia==
* The name of the achievement is likely a reference to the movie ''{{w|Star Wars (film)|Star Wars: A New Hope}}'', where Obi-Wan Kenobi says [https://youtu.be/o2we_B6hDrY "Use the Force, Luke"] to Luke Skywalker while he is firing on the Death Star.
